mapper.sql: id, sys_id, org_id, address, bus, city, env, fax, hotel_num, name, phone, post_code, sub_name, type, country, province, cr_iso_code, unique_num, need_rcu, need_tv, screen, welcomes_cn, welcomes_en, weather_code, city_name_en, roll_cn, roll_en, movie_group, chain_id, service_ip, brand_id, tv_lock_time, tv_lock_percent, air_config, create_time, creator, modify_time, modifier, available, lbs_lng_lat
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from hmp_hotel_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into hmp_hotel_info (id, sys_id, org_id, address, bus, city, env, fax, hotel_num, name, phone, post_code, sub_name, type, country, province, cr_iso_code, unique_num, need_rcu, need_tv, screen, welcomes_cn, welcomes_en, weather_code, city_name_en, roll_cn, roll_en, movie_group, chain_id, service_ip, brand_id, tv_lock_time, tv_lock_percent, air_config, create_time, creator, modify_time, modifier, available, lbs_lng_lat ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{env,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hotelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crIsoCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{uniqueNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needRcu,jdbcType=BIT}, #{needTv,jdbcType=BIT}, #{screen,jdbcType=BIT}, #{welcomesCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{welcomesEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weatherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rollCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rollEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movieGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tvLockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tvLockPercent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airConfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lbsLngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update hmp_hotel_info
sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bus = #{bus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
env = #{env,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hotel_num = #{hotelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_name = #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_iso_code = #{crIsoCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
unique_num = #{uniqueNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_rcu = #{needRcu,jdbcType=BIT},
need_tv = #{needTv,jdbcType=BIT},
screen = #{screen,jdbcType=BIT},
welcomes_cn = #{welcomesCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
welcomes_en = #{welcomesEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weather_code = #{weatherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_name_en = #{cityNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roll_cn = #{rollCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roll_en = #{rollEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
movie_group = #{movieGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chain_id = #{chainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_ip = #{serviceIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tv_lock_time = #{tvLockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tv_lock_percent = #{tvLockPercent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
air_config = #{airConfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT},
lbs_lng_lat = #{lbsLngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update hmp_hotel_info set sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bus = #{bus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, env = #{env,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hotel_num = #{hotelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_name = #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_iso_code = #{crIsoCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, unique_num = #{uniqueNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_rcu = #{needRcu,jdbcType=BIT}, need_tv = #{needTv,jdbcType=BIT}, screen = #{screen,jdbcType=BIT}, welcomes_cn = #{welcomesCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, welcomes_en = #{welcomesEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weather_code = #{weatherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_name_en = #{cityNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roll_cn = #{rollCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roll_en = #{rollEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, movie_group = #{movieGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chain_id = #{chainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_ip = #{serviceIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tv_lock_time = #{tvLockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tv_lock_percent = #{tvLockPercent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, air_config = #{airConfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, lbs_lng_lat = #{lbsLngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select hotel.* from hmp_hotel_info hotel,hmp_user_hotel userHotel,hmp_user user where hotel.id = userHotel.hotel_id and user.id = userHotel.user_id and user.id = #{userId}
